payload.name: rdma-kernel-bypass-io
payload.title: RDMA/kernel-bypass IO: higher performance, more footguns
payload.formal: bypassing kernel reduces overhead but removes safety rails; correctness burden shifts to user code.
payload.apm2_mapping: any “fast path” (direct executor access, privileged tools, bypassed gates) must be wrapped in **typed, verified libraries** and restricted to high-trust actors. Otherwise you just created a privileged injection surface.
